duties_responsibilities.duty: Code, test, and implement products for Accruent’s Maintenance Connection Enterprise Asset Management software suite.
Mentor entry-level Software Associates and review technical requirements.
Develop code in a variety of programming languages for a web-based enterprise application.
Create product using a 'test-driven design' approach.
Ensure all enhancements, bug fixes, and new products are documented.
Work with various teams to ensure project requirements are met.
Teach non-technical customers about the code.
Participate in a Development team responsible for developing quality software.
Demonstrate Accruent’s values: grit, integrity, drive to excellence, results orientation, winning attitude, humility.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience
